attributes.action: Ban plastic lids for takeaway cold drink cups by 30th April 2022.
attributes.additional_details: There is currently a petition for the return of plastic straws to McDonald's which currently hs over 30,000 signatures. This is obsurd.
attributes.background: Too many people are buying takeaway soft drinks from fast food outlets. Plastic straws are being phased out so why aren't the kids? If the drink isn't a hot tea/coffee then there is no need for it to be covered.
